reference.title: Triple'A Plus Core user-defined entities domain model properties

section.p:
A domain model must respect the following conditions to be treated as a Triple'A Plus Core user-defined entities (UDEs) model:
Project must be qualified as a Triple'A project by having the nature <nature>com.odcgroup.aaa.core.AAANature</nature> in the .project file.
Domain file must have been created with the Triple'A user-defined entities domain property checked. You can verify this property by looking for the annotation @aaa:TripleA (UDEntities=true)in the domain name.
